scenario_text.value:
Oh... I think he’s worried about Minoru
and Falcomon.

Same, Kunemon, same.
I want them to get back on good terms, too.

What?!
SHHHH! Don’t say that, Kunemon!

If Minoru and Falcomon can overcome this like
we did, they’ll understand each other better.

Well, you two really do seem to understand
each other, haha!

But, Kunemon, doing dangerous stuff just to
get closer is risky...
Hmph! Well, I’m not into cheap tricks.

They just need to be open and honest
with each other.

Exactly.
Not a good time for falling out.
